metadata.title: CVE-2020-17448 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Telegram Desktop through 2.1.13 allows a spoofed file type to bypass theDangerous File Type Execution protection mechanism, as demonstrated by useof the chat window with a filename that lacks an extension.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
